Message.description: Represents a chat message in the conversation.
Message.title: Message

Source.description: Represents a source of information that can be displayed and referenced.
Source.title: Source

title.description: Title of the source displayed in the SourcesDisplay component.
title.title: title

type.description: Type of the source, used to determine the type of data to display in the ContentDisplay component.
type.title: type

description.description: Description of the source displayed in the SourcesDisplay component if provided.
description.title: description

relevance.description: Relevance score of the source. It is displayed in the SourcesDisplay component as bar chart.
relevance.title: relevance

href.description: Optional href to display a link to the source in the SourcesDisplay component.
href.title: href

data.description:
Optional data to display in the ContentDisplay component. This can be set initially
or lazily loaded when the `SET_SELECTED_SOURCE` action is handled. Simply return the data 
from your `onAction()` function as `sourceData\` in the response.
data.title: data

metadata.description:
key convention to hide from display _key

If type='pdf', you can set the 'page' and '_page' properties to specify the page number to display in the SourcesDisplay component.
metadata.title: metadata

highlights.description: Highlight annotations in the PDF document. Only applicable for PDF sources.
highlights.title: highlights

StreamChunk.description: Represents a chunk of streamed content.

PDFHighlight.description: Represents a highlight annotation in a PDF document.
PDFHighlight.title: PDFHighlight

page.description: The page number where the highlight appears. Page numbers are 1-based.
page.title: page

rect.description: The rectangle coordinates of the highlight

top.description: Top position of the highlight (relative to the page)
top.title: top

left.description: Left position of the highlight (relative to the page)
left.title: left

width.description: Width of the highlight (relative to the page width)
width.title: width

height.description: Height of the highlight (relative to the page height)
height.title: height

rect.title: rect

UUID.description: A UUID string in the format "xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx".
UUID.title: UUID
